text: Napiye! Nir muhminkalai porukku arva muttuviraka unkalil porumaiyutaiyavarkal irupatu per iruntal, irunuru perkalai verri kolvarkal. Innum unkalil nuru per iruntal avarkal kahpirkalil ayiram perai verri kolvarkal; enenil (muhminkalai etirppor) niccayamaka arivillata makkalaka iruppatu tan (karanam)
